name: RagBrawl
description:
Welcome to RagBrawl, the new party game on the block that has you grappling, ragdolling, and battling your way to victory! In this online multiplayer party game, you compete as a floppy Tuffling toy, taking on a variety of objectives and challenges.

RagBrawl is all about fast-paced, chaotic action. With a range of game modes to choose from, there's always a new challenge to tackle. Whether you're looking to team up with friends or take on the competition solo, there's a mode to suit your playstyle!

Game Modes


In Infected mode, avoid being "infected" and turned moldy. Only the strongest players can survive until the end.

In Spool mode, the last player with the spool takes it all! Hold onto a spool until the end of the round or get eliminated!



Rag Race mode puts players' grappling skills to the test. Race through an obstacle course, zipping from one room to the next, all while avoiding obstacles along the way.

Finally, Stuffed mode is a free-for-all skirmish where you battle it out to defeat other players and collect the fluff they drop behind. The player with the most fluff at the end of the game wins!

Customization


Stand out in the crowd! RagBrawl features a robust cosmetic system to customize your Tuffling toy with hats, colors, and patterns. Show off your style as you battle your way to the top!



No matter which mode you choose, RagBrawl is packed with features to keep the action fresh and exciting! Using ranged and melee combat, or the ability to grapple and ragdoll your way around the map, players need to be quick on their feet and creative in their approach to emerge victorious.

So get ready to ragdoll in RagBrawl, and show the competition what you're made of! With its fast-paced action, exciting game modes, and endless customization options, it's the perfect game for any party!
